casebody.data:
STATE
v.
MIZE 2018-1711 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 20, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Cause accepted on proposition of law No. I and held for the decision in 2018-0012, State v. Hitchcock. French, J., would accept the cause on all propositions of law.

Kennedy, Fischer and DeWine, JJ., dissent.
